Package me.hapyl.spigotutils.module.config

Class Config

java.lang.Object
me.hapyl.spigotutils.module.config.Config
Direct Known Subclasses:
PlayerConfig
public class Config extends Object
Creates config file.

    • loadDataFields

      public final int loadDataFields()
      Loads all DataField fields from the config.
      Returns:
      amount of fields loaded.

    • saveDataFields

      public final int saveDataFields()
      Writes all DataField fields to the config with their path().

      Note: This doesn't actually save values to the config, only writes them. You must call {@link this#save()} to save the config.

      Returns:
      amount of fields written.

    • save

      public final void save()
      Saves the config to the file. You must call this method to actually save the config, {@link this#set(String, Object)} only sets the value to configuration section.
      See Also:
      • ConfigurationSection

    • reloadConfig

      public final void reloadConfig()
      Saves and loads config.

    • reloadDataFields

      public final void reloadDataFields()
      Saves current data fields values, reloads the config and loads data fields.

    • forceLoad

      public void forceLoad(boolean confirm)
      This forces config file to load from the disk, WITHOUT saving current config file.
      Parameters:
      confirm - - Confirm that you are aware that file will NOT be saved.
